text: The 1917 Marquette Golden Avalanche football team was an American football team that represented Marquette University as an independent during the 1917 college football season. In its first season under head coach John J. Ryan, the team compiled an 8–0–1 record, shut out eight of nine opponents, and outscored all opponents by a total of 341 to 7. ==Schedule== ==References== Marquette Category:Marquette Golden Avalanche football seasons Category:College football undefeated seasons Marquette Golden Avalanche football
title: 1917 Marquette Golden Avalanche football team
